patch.summary: Clears or assigns an existing node to the parent relationship of an individual node.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the node whose parent relationship to assign or clear.

requestBody.description: The identity of the node to assign to the parent relationship, or `null` to clear the relationship.

204.description: The parent relationship was successfully updated, which did not result in additional changes.

400.description: The request body is missing or malformed.

404.description: The node or a related resource does not exist.

409.description: The request body contains conflicting information or another resource with the same ID already exists.

422.description: Validation of the request body failed.

post.summary: Adds existing nameValuePairs to the values relationship of an individual node.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the node to add nameValuePairs to.

requestBody.description: The identities of the nameValuePairs to add to the values relationship.

204.description: The nameValuePairs were successfully added, which did not result in additional changes.

400.description: The request body is missing or malformed.

404.description: The node or a related resource does not exist.

409.description: The request body contains conflicting information or another resource with the same ID already exists.

422.description: Validation of the request body failed.

patch.summary: Assigns existing nameValuePairs to the values relationship of an individual node.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the node whose values relationship to assign.

requestBody.description: The identities of the nameValuePairs to assign to the values relationship, or an empty array to clear the relationship.

204.description: The values relationship was successfully updated, which did not result in additional changes.

400.description: The request body is missing or malformed.

404.description: The node or a related resource does not exist.

409.description: The request body contains conflicting information or another resource with the same ID already exists.

422.description: Validation of the request body failed.

delete.summary: Removes existing nameValuePairs from the values relationship of an individual node.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the node to remove nameValuePairs from.

requestBody.description: The identities of the nameValuePairs to remove from the values relationship.

204.description: The nameValuePairs were successfully removed, which did not result in additional changes.

400.description: The request body is missing or malformed.

404.description: The node or a related resource does not exist.

409.description: The request body contains conflicting information or another resource with the same ID already exists.

422.description: Validation of the request body failed.
